code: import React from'react';import{UsersIcon,BellIcon,TrophyIcon,ChartBarIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Statistics=_ref=>{let{statistics}=_ref;if(!statistics)return null;const stats=[{name:'Всего пользователей',value:statistics.total_users,icon:UsersIcon,color:'bg-blue-500'},{name:'С уведомлениями',value:statistics.active_users,icon:BellIcon,color:'bg-green-500'},{name:'Всего розыгрышей',value:statistics.total_raffles,icon:TrophyIcon,color:'bg-purple-500'},{name:'Активных розыгрышей',value:statistics.active_raffles,icon:ChartBarIcon,color:'bg-yellow-500'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6",children:stats.map(stat=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`p-3 rounded-lg ${stat.color}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(stat.icon,{className:"h-6 w-6 text-white"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ml-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:stat.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-800",children:stat.value})]})]})},stat.name))});};export default Statistics;
